verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when הֵחֵ֣ל <S%H2490><s%> began הָֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> And it came to pass when men לָרֹ֖ב <S%H7231><s%> to multiply עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> the face הָֽאֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> of the earth וּבָנ֖וֹת <S%H1323><s%> and daughters יֻלְּד֥וּ <S%H3205><s%> were born לָהֶֽם׃

וַיִּרְא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> saw בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> That the sons הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> the daughters הָֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of men כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for טֹבֹ֖ת <S%H2896><s%> [were] fair הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2007><s%> that they וַיִּקְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> and they took לָהֶם֙ נָשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> them wives מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> they בָּחָֽרוּ׃ <S%H977><s%> of all which they chose

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יָד֨וֹן <S%H1777><s%> strive רוּחִ֤י <S%H7307><s%> My spirit בָֽאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> with man לְעֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> shall not always בְּשַׁגַּ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> for that he also ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בָשָׂ֑ר <S%H1320><s%> is flesh וְהָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become יָמָ֔יו <S%H3117><s%> yet his days מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> shall be an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

הַנְּפִלִ֞ים <S%H5303><s%> There were giants הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> were on בָאָרֶץ֮ <S%H776><s%> in the earth בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> in those days הָהֵם֒ <S%H1992><s%> [children] to them the same וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> and also אַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> and also after כֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> that אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> when יָבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> came in בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> the sons הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> unto the daughters הָֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of men וְיָלְד֖וּ <S%H3205><s%> and they bare לָהֶ֑ם הֵ֧מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Those הַגִּבֹּרִ֛ים <S%H1368><s%> [became] mighty men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who מֵעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> which [were] of old אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> men הַשֵּֽׁם׃ <S%H8034><s%> of renown פ

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And GOD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for רַבָּ֛ה <S%H7227><s%> [was] great רָעַ֥ת <S%H7451><s%> that the wickedness הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of man בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every יֵ֙צֶר֙ <S%H3336><s%> and [that] every imagination מַחְשְׁבֹ֣ת <S%H4284><s%> of the thoughts לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> of his heart רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> [was] only רַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> continually

וַיִּנָּ֣חֶם <S%H5162><s%> And it repented יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> that he had made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> man בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> on the earth וַיִּתְעַצֵּ֖ב <S%H6087><s%> and it grieved אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> him at לִבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3820><s%> his heart

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶמְחֶ֨ה <S%H4229><s%> I will destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָדָ֤ם <S%H120><s%> man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom בָּרָ֙אתִי֙ <S%H1254><s%> whom I have created מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> from פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from the face הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> of the earth מֵֽאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> both man עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> and בְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> beast עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against רֶ֖מֶשׂ <S%H7431><s%> and the creeping thing וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> and to ע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and the fowls הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the air כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נִחַ֖מְתִּי <S%H5162><s%> for it repenteth כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for עֲשִׂיתִֽם׃ <S%H6213><s%> me that I have made
וְנֹ֕חַ <S%H5146><s%> But Noah מָ֥צָא <S%H4672><s%> found חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the eyes יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD פ

אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These תּוֹלְדֹ֣ת <S%H8435><s%> These [are] the generations נֹ֔חַ <S%H5146><s%> of Noah נֹ֗חַ <S%H5146><s%> Noah אִ֥ישׁ <S%H582><s%> another צַדִּ֛יק <S%H6662><s%> was a just תָּמִ֥ים <S%H8549><s%> [and] perfect הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְּדֹֽרֹתָ֑יו <S%H1755><s%> in his generations אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הָֽאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> with God הִֽתְהַלֶּךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> walked נֹֽחַ׃ <S%H5146><s%> [and] Noah

וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> begat נֹ֖חַ <S%H5146><s%> And Noah שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> three בָנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> sons אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8035><s%> Shem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חָ֥ם <S%H2526><s%> Ham וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָֽפֶת׃ <S%H3315><s%> and Japheth

וַתִּשָּׁחֵ֥ת <S%H7843><s%> also was corrupt הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The earth לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God וַתִּמָּלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> was filled הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the earth חָמָֽס׃ <S%H2555><s%> with violence

וַיַּ֧רְא <S%H7200><s%> looked אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold נִשְׁחָ֑תָה <S%H7843><s%> and behold it was corrupt כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִשְׁחִ֧ית <S%H7843><s%> had corrupted כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all בָּשָׂ֛ר <S%H1320><s%> for all flesh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H1870><s%> his way עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> And God לְנֹ֗חַ <S%H5146><s%> unto Noah קֵ֤ץ <S%H7093><s%> The end כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בָּשָׂר֙ <S%H1320><s%> of all flesh בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> is come לְפָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> before me כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מָלְאָ֥ה <S%H4390><s%> is filled with הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> for the earth חָמָ֖ס <S%H2555><s%> violence מִפְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> through them וְהִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> I am about מַשְׁחִיתָ֖ם <S%H7843><s%> and behold I will destroy אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> them with הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

עֲשֵׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> Make לְךָ֙ תֵּבַ֣ת <S%H8392><s%> thee an ark עֲצֵי־ <S%H6086><s%> wood גֹ֔פֶר <S%H1613><s%> of gopher קִנִּ֖ים <S%H7064><s%> rooms תַּֽעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou make אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> in הַתֵּבָ֑ה <S%H8392><s%> the ark וְכָֽפַרְתָּ֥ <S%H3722><s%> and shalt pitch אֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> מִבַּ֥יִת <S%H1004><s%> it within וּמִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> and without בַּכֹּֽפֶר׃ <S%H3724><s%> with pitch

וְזֶ֕ה <S%H2088><s%> This אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> is how תַּֽעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> And this [is the fashion] which thou shalt make אֹתָ֑הּ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹ֧שׁ <S%H7969><s%> [shall be] three מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אַמָּ֗ה <S%H520><s%> cubits אֹ֚רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> it [of] The length הַתֵּבָ֔ה <S%H8392><s%> of the ark חֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <S%H2572><s%> of it fifty אַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> cubits רָחְבָּ֔הּ <S%H7341><s%> the breadth וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> of it thirty אַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> cubits קוֹמָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H6967><s%> and the height

צֹ֣הַר ׀ <S%H6672><s%> A window תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou make לַתֵּבָ֗ה <S%H8392><s%> to the ark וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> and in a cubit תְּכַלֶ֣נָּה <S%H3615><s%> shalt thou finish מִלְמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> it above וּפֶ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> and the door הַתֵּבָ֖ה <S%H8392><s%> of the ark בְּצִדָּ֣הּ <S%H6654><s%> in the side thereof תָּשִׂ֑ים <S%H7760><s%> shalt thou set תַּחְתִּיִּ֛ם <S%H8482><s%> [with] lower שְׁנִיִּ֥ם <S%H8145><s%> second וּשְׁלִשִׁ֖ים <S%H7992><s%> and third תַּֽעֲשֶֽׂהָ׃ <S%H6213><s%> [stories] shalt thou make

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I הִנְנִי֩ <S%H2005><s%> behold מֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> even I do bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּבּ֥וּל <S%H3999><s%> a flood מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> of waters עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth לְשַׁחֵ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> to destroy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> [and] every thing בָּשָׂ֗ר <S%H1320><s%> all flesh אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בּוֹ֙ ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wherein [is] the breath חַיִּ֔ים <S%H2416><s%> of life מִתַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> from under הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> heaven כֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> everything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בָּאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> that [is] in the earth יִגְוָֽע׃ <S%H1478><s%> shall die

וַהֲקִמֹתִ֥י <S%H6965><s%> But with thee will I establish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתִ֖י <S%H1285><s%> my covenant אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> and you וּבָאתָ֙ <S%H935><s%> and thou shalt come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַתֵּבָ֔ה <S%H8392><s%> the ark אַתָּ֕ה <S%H859><s%> thou וּבָנֶ֛יךָ <S%H1121><s%> and thy sons וְאִשְׁתְּךָ֥ <S%H802><s%> and thy wife וּנְשֵֽׁי־ <S%H802><s%> wives בָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H1121><s%> and thy sons' אִתָּֽךְ׃ <S%H854><s%> and of

וּמִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הָ֠חַי <S%H2416><s%> And of every living thing מִֽכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בָּשָׂ֞ר <S%H1320><s%> of all flesh שְׁנַ֧יִם <S%H8147><s%> two מִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> of every תָּבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> of every [sort] shalt thou bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַתֵּבָ֖ה <S%H8392><s%> into the ark לְהַחֲיֹ֣ת <S%H2421><s%> to keep [them] alive אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> for זָכָ֥ר <S%H2145><s%> with thee they shall be male וּנְקֵבָ֖ה <S%H5347><s%> and female יִֽהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

מֵהָע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> Of fowls לְמִינֵ֗הוּ <S%H4327><s%> after their kind וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and of הַבְּהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> and of cattle לְמִינָ֔הּ <S%H4327><s%> after their kind מִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> of every רֶ֥מֶשׂ <S%H7431><s%> of every creeping thing הָֽאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> of the earth לְמִינֵ֑הוּ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind שְׁנַ֧יִם <S%H8147><s%> two מִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> of every יָבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> of every [sort] shall come אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you לְהַֽחֲיֽוֹת׃ <S%H2421><s%> unto thee to keep [them] alive

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> And take לְךָ֗ מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all מַֽאֲכָל֙ <S%H3978><s%> thou unto thee of all food אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יֵֽאָכֵ֔ל <S%H398><s%> that is eaten וְאָסַפְתָּ֖ <S%H622><s%> and thou shalt gather אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> about וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְךָ֛ וְלָהֶ֖ם לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <S%H402><s%> [it] to thee and it shall be for food

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> Thus did נֹ֑חַ <S%H5146><s%> Noah כְּ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> according to all that God כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> him so did ס
